#Korben Van Der Vendt

#clear working environment

```{r}
#| echo: true
rm(list = ls())
```

#installing packages

```{r}
#| echo: true
library(rinat) 
library(magrittr) 
library(sf) 
library(leaflet) 
library(htmltools) 

```

#calling and inspecting data from iNaturalist

```{r}
#| echo: true
beetle_obs <- get_inat_obs(taxon_name = "Anthia decemguttata",
                           maxresults = 1000)
head(beetle_obs)
colnames(beetle_obs)
```

#filtering list by availability of location data

```{r}
#| echo: true
beetle_obs <- subset(beetle_obs, !is.na(latitude))
```

```{r}
-32+(20/60)+(888/3600), -32+(20/60)+(340/3600), -32+(20/60)+(140/3600), -32+(19/60)+(637/3600), -32+(16/60)+(674/3600))

site_long <- c(18+(18/60)+(858/3600), 18+(31/60)+(799/3600), 18+(59/60)+(491/3600), 19+(00/60)+(417/3600), 19+(05/60)+(079/3600), 19+(09/60)+(970/3600), 19+(14/60)+(459/3600), 19+(13/60)+(969/3600), 19+(08/60)+(753/3600), 19+(08/60)+(938/3600), 19+(09/60)+(695/3600), 19+(10/60)+(018/3600),

```

#creating data frame for study sites locations

```{r}
#| echo: true
site_locations <- data.frame( description= rep('Study site', 17), place_guess= rep('The Cederberg Mountaints', 17),latitude= site_lat, longitude= site_long)
```
